org.jetel.component

Interface MultiMetadataProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MetadataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultiMetadataProvider

    public interface MultiMetadataProvider
extends MetadataProvider
    MetadataProvider which allows to provide multiple metadata for a single port. This feature is not completely supported now, but for example Designer could use multiple metadata for generation metadata from template - user can choose one of available metadata for dedicated port.
